article:
"'Transience'" is a short story by ArthurÂ C. Clarke.

Probably the most interesting aspect of this story is its opening part -
reluctant exploration of the surrounding world by a little child in a way that
reminds of the first story in [[2001: A Space Odyssey (novel)|2001: A Space
Odyssey]].

The story is told through the medium of three children playing at about the same
physical location on Earth, but across vast gulfs of time.

It is collected in [[The Other Side of the Sky]].
categories: Short stories by Arthur C. Clarke
